events.name: Pittsburgh Penguins at Toronto Maple Leafs

headlines.description: — William Nylander had two goals and an assist in the third period, helping the Toronto Maple Leafs rally for a wild 4-3 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: William Nylander helps the Maple Leafs rally past the Penguins 4-3

events.name: Edmonton Oilers at St. Louis Blues

headlines.description: — Dalibor Dvorsky scored his first NHL goal to start a St. Louis rally, and Pius Suter provided the game-winner with 1:23 to play as the Blues snapped a seven-game losing streak by beating the Edmonton Oilers 3-2 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dvorsky scores his 1st NHL goal as the Blues stop a 7-game slide by edging the Oilers 3-2

video.headline: Blues snap 7-game losing streak thanks to Pius Suter's late goal

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Blues snap 7-game losing streak thanks to Pius Suter's late goal) 2025/11/04 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Blues snap 7-game losing streak thanks to Pius Suter's late goal
highlights.description: Pius Suter scores the game-winner as the Blues snap a 7-game losing streak with a 3-2 win over the Oilers.

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Blues snap 7-game losing streak thanks to Pius Suter's late goal) 2025/11/04 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Brock Boeser scored twice, including the winner 4:58 into overtime, to lead the Vancouver Canucks to a 5-4 victory over the Nashville Predators on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Boeser scores twice, including in OT, to lead Canucks over Predators 5-4

headlines.description: — Matty Beniers and Jordan Eberle each had a goal and an assist as the Seattle Kraken beat the Chicago Blackhawks 3-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eberle’s late goal helps Kraken beat Blackhawks 3-1
